Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers exhibited deep highest occupied molecular orbital energy levels and subsequently lead to high open circuit voltages of fabricated solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymers |
| highest occupied molecular orbital energy levels |
| solar cell devices |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

The two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "deep highest occupied molecular orbital energy levels" and "high open circuit voltages". These entities are mentioned as the properties of the polymers and the solar cell devices, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| high open circuit voltages |

The two entities in the paragraph are still "deep highest occupied molecular orbital energy levels" and "high open circuit voltages," which are both material properties.
